content:
Name Crit Effect Type
Creeping Hesitation You are flat-footed until the end of your next turn. Melee
Insecure You take a -1 circumstance penalty to attacks rolls until you score a critical hit. Ranged
Great Roar Until healed, you are deafened. Unarmed
Error! You deal the spell's normal damage to yourself instead of the target. Spell
name: Critical Fumble Deck #40
